events.title: Challenge Adventure Race
events.text: Starts at 9am November 19 in Uptown Columbus. This four-hour course includes biking, trekking, paddling, navigation and mystery events.

events.title: Holiday Food Drive
events.text: Helping the community during the holidays is its own reward. Bring some canned goods and enjoy some fee music in the park.

events.title: Weekend Warriors
events.text: Join other Cycle Club members every second saturday for some food and ride around town.

events.title: Race for the Cure
events.text: Join your fellow cyclists as they raise money to help fight cancer.

events.title: Weekend Warriors
events.text: Join other Cycle Club members every second saturday for some food and ride around town.

posts.title: Take in those Fall Colors!
posts.text: As the leaves begin to change there is no better time to hit the trail. Don't worry about getting those new tires dirty, CycleClub members receive free tune-ups in store.

posts.title: A Little Bit of Nature
posts.text: The hoiday season is just around the corner. Now is the time to get out and enjoy a bit of mother nature. Breathe the fresh air and let all the stress of day simply melt away.

posts.title: Eating your Fruits and Vegitables
posts.text: Happy New Year! Every new year brings hope that maybe this time you'll succeed at your new year's resolution. The best way to keep yourself healthy and fit is to get excersize and enjoy a healthy diet containing fruits and vegitables.

posts.title: Hitting the road with friends
posts.text: New club events are being scheduled every day, join today and take the new year by the handlebars. There is no need to ride alone with CycleWorld.

posts.title: Love is in the Air
posts.text: Show her how much she means to you. Nothing says I love you like the time you spend together. Men's and women's bikes and picnic accessories now on sale throughout the month!

benefits.title: Free Shipping
benefits.description: Members receive free shipping on all CycleWorld online orders

benefits.title: In-Store Tune Ups
benefits.description: Your ride will always be in top shape with complimentary maintenence

benefits.title: Newsletter
